Title: Bangzi Melody
Writer: Dashan Jia, Baoluo Li, Bin Wu
Actors: Zhibing Li, Chunzhu Liang, Chunming Wang, Aihua Lu
Plot: Life on a small village in China during the last years of the Cultural Revolution takes a different course when the people is asked to prepare and perform a classic opera for government officials, entangling past, present and fiction.
